title: Goldman Sachs Awards One-Time Bonuses to Executives David Solomon, John Waldron; Bank grants restricted stock awards and cites 'the rapidly increasing war for talent'
text:
The awards aren't part of their regular annual compensation. The bank said in a filing that it wants to "ensure leadership continuity over the next 5+ years"â€”roughly the time frame that Mr. Solomon is expected to stay. It also cited "the rapidly increasing war for talent in the current environment."

Goldman slashed the 2020 pay for Mr. Solomon and Mr. Waldron as punishment for the bank's involvement with a corrupt Malaysian government fund known as 1MDB. Mr. Solomon received a $17.5 million compensation package for 2020.

JPMorgan Chase & Co. gave CEO Jamie Dimon a surprise retention bonus in July.
